product.longDescription: Sarah's Choice consistently comes out on top of our on-farm taste tests. Its flavor combined with its attractive oval fruits and ideal 3-lb. size, make it the best variety for retail sales. Harvest at full-slip (when a gentle tug removes the fruit from the vine). Bred by Dr. Brent Loy of the University of New Hampshire. Intermediate resistance to Fusarium wilt races 0–2 and powdery mildew. Avg. 20,800 seeds/lb. Packet: 30 seeds.
